          UCR Theatre: Culmination Celebration 
         
 UCR Department of Theatre, Film, and Digital Production  
 6th Annual  
Culmination Celebration 
 Hosted by Prof. Stu Krieger 
 Join us for this exciting event featuring performances by our graduating seniors and a presentation of the winners of this year’s Marius de Brabant Chancellor’s Performance Awards, the Eric Barr Acting Award, the Richard Risso Award, and the Emory Elliott Award. 
 JUNE 11, 2021 
Friday, 7:00 pm 
ONLINE 
 Premiere on the   TFDP YouTube Channel   
 A PDF of the program for  Culmination Celebration  can be downloaded  here   
 Information:  tfdp@ucr.edu    
 theatre.ucr.edu 
 • View the 2020-2021 Season  here .  
 
 
 
  Friday, June 11 at 7:00pm
           

          
            to  9:00pm
